about_the_game:
I believe every player can have their own way of playing this game.

Some enjoy challenging themselves, finding solutions to conquer seemingly impossible obstacles, and making plans to achieve great deeds.

But, some just want to enjoy themselves, playing more casually, face-rolling across all enemies, and one-shot some ancient evil gods with sniper rifles or rocket launchers.

That's why we already have a combat difficulty setting in the game, making your character almost invincible on the lowest difficulty. But, even that may still not be enough. After all, this is a dangerous secret world with all kinds of unspeakable horror.

Thus, in this FREE DLC, a chest will appear in the safe house. You can find a lot of guns, ammo, and weapon modules to help you defeat your fear.

Why it's a DLC? Because not everyone will enjoy such content to make the game a lot easier.

Thus, I want to make it optional, You can use the content of this DLC or not, it's all up to you.

But, the meaningful choice must be here.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC only adds a chest that unlocks some guns already in the base game. Guns themselves are not mature content. Guns themselves do not necessarily cause violence. But,  people who use them can shoot and kill. Thus, to be safe, I clicked the "Violence or Gore" tags when publishing this DLC.

name: [Neolithic]All Fear Comes from the Lack of Firepower
short_description: The DLC adds a weapon chest in your safe house. It provides a lot of guns, ammo, and weapon modules to make your journey a lot easier. However, that may kill the fun of tactical thinking in our turn-based combat. and strategically planning before each battle.
